Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! Following your recent assessment with us, weâ€™d like to offer you a role this summer as a {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}.
In the interest of fairness. we offer our roles on a first-come-first-serve basis. Unfortunately, we have currently allocated all of our roles for the upcoming seasonal programme. However, we would like to offer you a place on our back-up staff, and hope to be able to confirm a work placement for you soon.
What happens now?
Your programmes team will be in touch soon to discuss your role with you, and when a role becomes available, you will be contacted immediately.
In the meantime, if you have any questions about your role or the back-up staff process, please contact seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Thank you for your patience - we hope to be able to offer you a confirmed role soon!
Best wishes,
The Challenge NCS Programme seasonalroles@the-challenge.org Email Reference: CR 5.5.3
